mapper.sql: ly_user.id, ly_user.userName, ly_user.accountName, (select group_concat(name) from ly_role where ly_role.id in (SELECT roleId FROM ly_user_role WHERE userId=ly_user.id) ) roleName, ly_user.password, ly_user.description, ly_user.locked, ly_user.credentialsSalt, ly_user.createTime, enterprise_info.name as enterprise_name, sub_enterprise_point.name as point_name
mapper.select:
select
from ly_user LEFT JOIN user_enterprise_relation ON user_enterprise_relation.user_id = ly_user.id LEFT JOIN enterprise_info ON user_enterprise_relation.ent_id = enterprise_info.id LEFT JOIN sub_enterprise_point ON user_enterprise_relation.sub_point_id=sub_enterprise_point.id where 1 = 1
and accountName like '%${accountName}%'
order by ${column} ${sort}
